argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iprodclim.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | iprodclim.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | iprodclim.3 | |- ( ph -> E. n e. Z E. y ( y =/= 0 /\ seq n ( x. , F ) ~~> y ) ) |
| 4 |  | iprodclim.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 5 |  | iprodclim.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 7 | 1, 3, 6 | #P_ntrivcvg | |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 8 |  | #P_climdm | |- ( seq M ( x. , F ) e. dom ~~> <-> seq M ( x. , F ) ~~> ( ~~> ` seq M ( x. , F ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , F ) ~~> ( ~~> ` seq M ( x. , F ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_iprod | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. Z A = ( ~~> ` seq M ( x. , F ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , F ) ~~> prod_ k e. Z A ) |
